## ggplot2


```{r}

library(ggplot2)
library(dplyr)
library(ggrepel)
uu <- data.frame(wz=rnorm(50,2),p=runif(50))


ggplot(uu,aes(wz,p))+
  geom_point()+
  geom_point(data=uu %>% filter(wz >2),color="red")+
  geom_hline(yintercept=(-log10(0.01)))+
  theme_classic()+
  geom_text_repel(data=uu %>% filter(wz >2),aes(label=sprintf("%0.2f", round(wz, digits = 2))))
```
